Function reference

EQ5D objects

new_eq5d3l() new_eq5d3l() new_eq5dy() validate_eq5d() validate_eq5d3l() validate_eq5d5l() validate_eq5dy()
EQ5D constructors and validators
as_eq5d5l() as_eq5d3l() as_eq5dy()
Coerce to an EQ5D object
as.data.frame(<EQ5D>)
Coerce an EQ5D object to a data frame
as.data.table(<EQ5D>)
Coerce an EQ5D object to a data.table

Utility objects

new_utility() validate_utility()
Utility constructor and validator

Metric and summary calculations

available_valuesets()
Available value sets
calculate_utility() add_utility()
Calculate utility
calculate_limitation()
Calculate limitation
calculate_pchc()
Calculate the Paretian Classification of Health Change
calculate_qalys()
Calculate quality of life years
summary(<EQ5D>)
Summary method for eq5d objects

Datasets

eq5d3l_example
EQ-5D-3L example data
EQ5D5L_surveys
EQ-5D-5L multiple survey example data
